name: Semi-supervised Co-training
description: Multi-view co-training involves training the classifiers in completely different views of training data. On the other hand, single-view co-training methods are generally applied as ensemble methods.
x_kb_article:
## References
Jashish Shrestha. (n.d.). Beginner's Guide to Semi-Supervised Learning. [Link](http://jashish.com.np/blog/posts/beginners-guide-to-semi-supervised-learning/)
